thread.title: Model Hilary Rhoda, Sean Avery Are Married: See Her Wedding Dress
thread.title_full: Model Hilary Rhoda, Sean Avery Are Married: See Her Wedding Dress

author: Marisa Laudadio
title: Model Hilary Rhoda, Sean Avery Are Married: See Her Wedding Dress
text:
Model Hilary Rhoda, Sean Avery Are Married: See Her Wedding Dress Wonderwall 16 hrs ago By Marisa Laudadio Â© INFphoto.com/. Hilary Rhoda, Sean Avery Are Married: See Her Wedding Dress
Model Hilary Rhoda and former hockey pro Sean Avery said "I do" just before sunset on Oct. 10 at the Parrish Art Museum in Water Mill, New York, in the Hamptons.
The bride, 28, wore a unique Carolina Herrera column dress featuring teal and black details on the back and bodice, while the groom, 35, wore a gray suit minus a tie for a more modern look.
The Victoria's Secret model and the retired athlete announced their engagement in November 2013 following three years of dating.
Their wedding comes less than two weeks after Sean was arrested in Southampton Village, New York, after he was caught allegedly throwing objects at cars. He also faces charges of criminal possession of a controlled substance after police found he had acetaminophen and oxycodone with him.
After Sean posted $500 bail, his attorney told Us Weekly that his client "has prescriptions for the medications that were the basis of this charge and looks forward to addressing the charges in court." Celebrity Weddings of 2015 -- So Far
